body_html:
@chenzhekl : Could you provide additional information in your response?

  1. I visit http://pytorch.org/
  2. On the form, I set (Linux, pip, 3.6, 8)
  3. The form gives me the following 2 lines to run
  4. I enter it, but the second line (pip3 install pytorch) fails with the message that @Six-wars posted
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl 
pip3 install torchvision

So how can I install pytorch before installing torchvision?
body_text:
@chenzhekl : Could you provide additional information in your response?

I visit http://pytorch.org/
On the form, I set (Linux, pip, 3.6, 8)
The form gives me the following 2 lines to run
I enter it, but the second line (pip3 install pytorch) fails with the message that @Six-wars posted

pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl 
pip3 install torchvision

So how can I install pytorch before installing torchvision?
body:
@chenzhekl : Could you provide additional information in your response?

1. I visit http://pytorch.org/
1. On the form, I set (Linux, pip, 3.6, 8)
1. The form gives me the following 2 lines to run
1. I enter it, but the second line (`pip3 install pytorch`) fails with the message that @Six-wars posted

```
pip3 install http://download.pytorch.org/whl/cu80/torch-0.3.0.post4-cp36-cp36m-linux_x86_64.whl 
pip3 install torchvision
```

So how can I install pytorch before installing torchvision?
